resources.string: Plesae press search to find a restaurant

string.name: infoDialogMessage
string.br: 1. The radius of searching diatance is 500m\n2. Wat2Eat fetch your location when app is first started, if you change location, please restart the app.

string.name: aboutPageDescription
string.br:
Wat2Eat is a non-profitable App.
Made as a practice App along my journey of becoming a Android Developer.

Hope you enjoy it.
Feel free to contact me with any questions or advices!
